title: President inaugurates spring tree plantation drive
content:
PESHAWAR, Feb 28 (APP):President Dr. Arif Alvi and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Governor Shah Farman Friday inaugurated the spring tree plantation drive by planting a sapling at Governor House.
President Dr. Arif Alvi and KP Governor also prayed for the sovereignty, progress
and development of the country.
Provincial Minister for Forests, Ishtiaq Urmur was present on the occasion.
